label: Pet Care Services
description: Services related to pet care, including boarding, sitting, and walking.
intents: Find a place to board my pet while I'm away
Hire someone to walk my dog
Find a pet sitter for my vacation

subcategories.label: Boarding Kennels
subcategories.description: Facilities that provide temporary housing for pets while their owners are away.

subcategories.label: Pet Sitting
subcategories.description: Services that provide in-home care for pets while their owners are away.

subcategories.label: Dog Walking
subcategories.description: Services that provide exercise and socialization for dogs.

subcategories.label: Pet Daycare
subcategories.description: Facilities that provide daytime care for pets while their owners are at work.

subcategories.label: Outdoor Kennels and Runs
subcategories.description: Outdoor enclosures for pets to exercise and play.
